parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the seatback can cause the driver or passenger to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The seatback collapses or reclines on its own
the seatback breaks or shears
the seatback bolts break
the seat moves forward and backward freely
the lower lumbar support moves forward.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The steering column locking can cause the vehicle to become difficult to steer, leading to a loss of control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The steering column becomes stuck or locked
making it hard to turn the wheel
the vehicle becomes difficult to steer
the driver experiences a sudden loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Poor Handling and Loss of Control
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The poor handling and loss of control can cause the vehicle to become unstable, leading to accidents or near-miss incidents.
symptoms: The vehicle wanders or drifts while driving
the vehicle is difficult to control
the vehicle responds slowly to steering input
the vehicle tends to pull to one side
the driver experiences a sudden loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission failure can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to a loss of control, accidents, or stranding the driver on the road. In addition, transmission failure can also cause damage to other components, leading to costly repairs.
symptoms: Transmission starts to smoke
transmission slips
loss of power
vehicle hesitates or stalls
unusual noises or vibrations from the transmission
difficulty shifting gears
warning lights or error messages on the dashboard.
